CustomField.formula: IF( Region__c = Text($CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SP_Quebec.Region__c) , CASE( Text(Contract_Type__c) , '119' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SP_Quebec.Email__c , '115' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.CR_Quebec.Email__c , '143' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.AB_Quebec.Email__c , '127' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.AC_Quebec.Email__c , '124', $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.RC_Quebec.Email__c , '141', $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.MB_Quebec.Email__c , '' ), CASE( Text(Contract_Type__c) , '119' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.SP.Email__c , '115' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.CR.Email__c , '143' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.AB.Email__c , '127' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.AC.Email__c , '124' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.RC.Email__c , '141' , $CustomMetadata.Order_Template_Signature_Infos__mdt.MB.Email__c , '' ) )
CustomField.label: Signature Email
